segments.pli: “Cha, bhikkhave, dhamme appahāya abhabbo arahattaṃ sacchikātuṃ.
segments.en: “Mendicants, without giving up six things you can’t realize perfection.

segments.pli: Thinaṃ, middhaṃ, uddhaccaṃ, kukkuccaṃ, assaddhiyaṃ, pamādaṃ—
segments.en: Dullness, drowsiness, restlessness, remorse, lack of faith, and negligence.

segments.pli: ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhamme appahāya abhabbo arahattaṃ sacchikātuṃ.
segments.en: Without giving up these six things you can’t realize perfection.

segments.pli: Cha, bhikkhave, dhamme pahāya bhabbo arahattaṃ sacchikātuṃ.
segments.en: After giving up six things you can realize perfection.

segments.pli: Thinaṃ, middhaṃ, uddhaccaṃ, kukkuccaṃ, assaddhiyaṃ, pamādaṃ—
segments.en: Dullness, drowsiness, restlessness, remorse, lack of faith, and negligence.

segments.pli: ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhamme pahāya bhabbo arahattaṃ sacchikātun”ti.
segments.en: After giving up these six things you can realize perfection.”
